sentences.en: Ambition is the seedling of genius, through love labor hands, in the fertile soil will become the strong sun.
sentences.cn: 志向是天才的幼苗，经过热爱劳动的双手的培育，在肥沃土里将成为粗壮的太阳。

sentences.en: As spring is approaching, the paddy field is full of grain seedling.
sentences.cn: 春天到了, 稻田里种满了禾苗.

sentences.en: But Violet Vale was purple with violets and the seedling apple tree Gilbert had once found far back in the woods was a huge tree peppered over with tiny, crimson-tipped blossom-buds.
sentences.cn: 但紫罗兰山谷仍开满了紫色的花朵，而吉尔伯特发现的那树林背后的苹果树苗如今也已经长成了绽满了细小花苞的大树。

sentences.en: Cotyledons play an important part in the early stages of seedling development.
sentences.cn: 子叶在种子发育的早期起到了重要的作用.

sentences.en: In maturation stage, it was decreased rapidly and lower than seedling.
sentences.cn: 成熟期微生物量碳含量迅速下降,都低于播种前.

sentences.en: In several respects they are also relevant to seedling orchards.
sentences.cn: 在某些方面它们也涉及到实生种子园.

sentences.en: In the Northwest, they are being planted by hedgerow on seedling roots, clonal and dwarfing stocks.
sentences.cn: 在西北部地区用灌木树篱把它接在实生砧 、 无性砧及矮化砧上.

sentences.en: In the Northwest, they are being planted by hedgrow on seedling roots, clonal and dwarfing stocks.
sentences.cn: 在西北部地区把它接在实生砧 、 无性砧及矮化砧上.

sentences.en: Keep the soil moist. That way, the seedling will flourish.
sentences.cn: 保持土壤湿润，那样幼苗就能茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Monoploid peaches have been obtained from seedling populations.
sentences.cn: 从实生群体里曾经得到过单倍体桃.

sentences.en: Physically separating the weed from the other plants, the researchers placed the dodder seedling in the middle of two plastic pipes, each leading to a plastic box containing a plant.
sentences.cn: 研究人员将菟丝子秧苗放到两个塑料圆筒中间，两个圆筒分别通向一个塑料盒子，盒子里各放着一种植物。

sentences.en: Result, effective in those days, sell seedling income 3000 multivariate.
sentences.cn: 结果, 当年见效, 出售果苗收入3000多元.

sentences.en: She cut down the seedling with one chop.
sentences.cn: 她一刀就把小苗砍倒了.

sentences.en: Thanks to her persistence, the Green seedling Project continues.
sentences.cn: 绿苗的坚持,是她的执着.

sentences.en: The development of the soybean seedling is dependent on the food reserves stored in the cotyledons.
sentences.cn: 大豆幼苗的发育依靠子叶中所贮存的养分.

sentences.en: The seedling are coming up full and green.
sentences.cn: 苗长得茁壮碧绿.

sentences.en: The two species effectively team up to break down young rice plants for their nutrients, causing a plant disease known as rice seedling blight.
sentences.cn: 这两个物种结合起来，能有效地分解水稻的幼苗作为它们的营养来源，并造成水稻幼苗的枯萎。

sentences.en: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentences.cn: 他们用杀真菌剂浸了种子来防止秧苗受病.

sentences.en: This process is as important as the watering and fertilizing the seedlings: without water and nourishment the seedling can never grow into a mature tree and yield any fruit.
sentences.cn: 这一过程同样重要，如浇灌和施肥：没有水和营养，幼苗永远不能长成一棵成熟的树，并产生任何果实。

sentences.en: This study provides theory basis and feasible measure for quickly raising seedling.
sentences.cn: 此研究为加速苗木培育提供了理论依据和可行措施.

sentences.en: Your lecture, it is so rich and colorful, your every word is like a long drought seedling get moist, we are under your moist, towering trees.
sentences.cn: 您讲的课，是那样丰富多彩，您的每句话犹如久旱的树苗得到滋润，我们就是在您的滋润下，长成参天大树。

trans.tran_en: a young plant or tree grown from a seed
